content.raw:
It broke a couple of other tests \(not test\_auxiliary\). One module tried to import basestring from auxiliary, which wouldn’t work on Python 3, and in target\_decoy `import math` broke on Python 2.7 because of an implicit relative import. \(I mean the import worked, but calling `math.factorial` didn’t.\)

So you can’t sync your fork now? That’s weird…
content.html:
It broke a couple of other tests (not test_auxiliary). One module tried to import basestring from auxiliary, which wouldn’t work on Python 3, and in target_decoy import math broke on Python 2.7 because of an implicit relative import. (I mean the import worked, but calling math.factorial didn’t.)

So you can’t sync your fork now? That’s weird…
